services.title: downbpiol
services.description: A tool to automate the download of useful files from the BPIOL website. Built using 100% Python and Selenium for browser automation. Provides a simple UI for ease of use.

services.title: xForm / drivemanager
services.description: A desktop application that allows to connect to a local or remote Synology NAS through its API, manage users and upload files to each user. Built using Python and PySimpleGUI
